subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5131 is on the way
description_text:

conversations.body_text:
it has been another 5 days and no response. where are my motors?

On Fri, Jan 2, 2026 at 4:10 AM service@simsonn.com

Hello, Can anyone update me to where my pedals are?

On Wed, Jan 7, 2026 at 3:23 AM Andrew Leachman <andrew.leachman88@gmail.com>
wrote:

> it has been another 5 days and no response. where are my motors?
>
> On Fri, Jan 2, 2026 at 4:10 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Andrew Leachman,       I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  ​https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047195321759
